author: USA TODAY, Editors, USA TODAY
title: The Lyrid meteor shower, Cuomo to visit Trump at White House, Queen Elizabeth II: 5 things to know Tuesday
description: The Lyrid meteor shower is coming to a sky near you, New York Gov. Cuomo to visit President Trump at the White House and more news to start your Tuesday.
content:
Look up at the sky for the Lyrid meteor shower 
The Lyrid meteor shower is coming to a sky near you on Tuesday night and early Wednesday morning, the first major meteor shower since January. The meteor shower sometimes bombards the sky with up to nearly 100 … [+3672 chars]
